messages.subject: Fw:  Go here http://www.redcross.org/ and give
messages.msgSnippet: They were just on the news with this request, so I am forwarding it to all who might not have the info. Lynda
messages.messageBody:
They were just on the news with this request, so I am forwarding it to all
who might not have the info.

Lynda
----- Original Message -----

> Donating to the Red Cross is one of the few
> things that we outside NYC and DC can do to help.
>
> I can't comprehend this tragedy. I can't
> comprehend why there was no forewarning.
> Someday, maybe, we'll know.
>
> In the meantime, thousands of very good people
> are dead, or terribly hurt. Let's help them and
> their families -- I think of all the children who
> lost their parents today.
> http://www.redcross.org/
>
